details.name: Test Tool
details.description: Adds a new tab next to the 'Sounds' tab on the Gandi IDE page.
details.jsCode: const soundsTab = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.gandi_editor-wrapper_tab_2OPuA')).find(tab => tab.innerText === 'Sounds'); if (soundsTab) { const newTab = document.createElement('li'); newTab.className = 'gandi_editor-wrapper_tab_2OPuA'; newTab.innerText = 'It works!!!!!'; soundsTab.parentNode.insertBefore(newTab, soundsTab.nextSibling); }
